channel.title: I need help getting my 317 online
channel.description: i have absolutly no clue how to put my 317 online. can someone help me pleaseeee

item.title: I need help getting my 317 online
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

I’m gonna help with what I know.

First thing, is make sure the server.batch is actually running. To do this, open your run.batch file. Then, open up your client, and connect to your IP, being 127.0.0.1. If it works, congrats, part one done.

Second, portforward. After you’ve portforwarded your router, I suggest going to this site - http://www.runelocus.com/?action=statuschecker - to check to see if you’ve portforwarded correctly. Remember to use your ACTUAL IP address, and to have your run.batch open when you check to see. If it says the server is online, good job. The hardest part is done.

Third, download No-IP, and get one of the IP’s. Such as MyServerScape.no-ip.org. Make sure that you turn the IP thing on with the DUC setup thing.

Fourth, make sure you change the client to connect to the No-IP address. Then you can distrubute the client with download sites like Uppit, Mediafire, etc. Get your friend to download it, and then he can connect, as long as your run.batch file stays online.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help getting my 317 online

item.description:
@chri55w wrote:

try checking your portforwarding too, use an online port checker like canyouseeme.org, port will probably be 43594 or 5555, check in server (usually shows when u run it)

item.title: I need help getting my 317 online
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zachs Owner Zachs
item.description:
@Owner_Zachs wrote:

morterdestroyer:

ok? i really dont care, keep getting ur post count up kiddos, if ur not gunna help me why comment? ur that desperate.

Desperate for what?.. Err anyways…

download No-ip register make domain

Next get source/ client.

If its webclient jared… Just youtube or pm Me Team viewer I can do it.

Next go to client.java and add your no-ip to all the spots the ip should be So Search maybe “no-ip” or Idk find that stuff add
Same thing to GUI sometimes GUI does not need editing so you might be okay their…

Next Compile make sure proper JDK
.zip Ur client add to uploading site Uppit.com or w/e and keep source open… If you have a modem I would use torrents

Torrents-
Edit
Preferences
Connection
Ip: whatever Like 5555 or 43954

Then you should be good to go…
any further help Feel free to get T.V and I can help you.

Tip: Make sure you open Client- no-ip- THEN TORRENTS If thats wut ur using.

NOTICE~~
No Whales where harmed when making this tiny Tut
